main: A form manifests before you. Surrounded in an impenetrable torrent of demonic energy. A presence so overwhelming that you cannot help but prostrate. Horns adorned his head like a crown, yet his face seemed so incredibly tender. This all-powerful Demon King seemed as a new born child. His eyes gazed off into the distance, not bothering to lock eyes with you or the Kijohime's body.

Those were the only words you would ever hear the Daimaou speak. With a simple motion, he claps his hands together, and the bowels of the earth open up to swallow Yomotsu Hirasaka. The mainland sinks back into the old underworld as chaos unfolds anew. A new world is born and the Daimaou rules over this realm with an indomitable iron fist. You are transformed by his will into a terrible four-headed dragon larger than mountains. You enforce his dominion my force and fire, and wield four vessels of his power. A form befitting a true servant of the Daimaou.
